welcome_message: We are pleased to present our unique complex of game servers Lineage2 Gracia Final & Interlude â€” without donation and with maximum comfort for players!
registration_info: Our servers have auto-registration. All you need to do is download our client and run it. In the game, simply enter your login and password. Please note: do not use the login and password you use on other servers to ensure the security of your account.
classic_builds_info: Our servers offer classic builds, closely resembling the official versions of the game. You will be able to enjoy the game in its true form, without unnecessary modifications.
support_info: All additional information about the game is available directly in the client or in our community. Here you can ask any questions and get help from other players.
join_us_message: We look forward to seeing you in our gaming world! Join us and become part of an exciting adventure!
